autonomous racing and drones for human pilot racing is that our drones have to carry a computer on board and to do
autonomous racing you need you know there's two ways you could do it really you could do Edge Computing which is all
the decisions that are made by the algorithms happen on board the Drone or you could offboard which means you have
a low latency comms link between the Drone and some high performance computer on the sideline somewhere and it reads
in signals sends it to the computer computer makes a decision sends it back that's less impressive technically and
it could actually create a problem because of the latency in the speed of the Drone so we decided to do uh fully
onboard Edge Computing which means you need um pretty impressive processor on this drone and uh there are some drones
that carry an onboard GPU but we wanted to make sure that we were giving people
